<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>((  OOC:  Okay, it seems we've had plenty of freakin out since i had some abrupt RL problems.  I hate to tell you all, but I can't commit myself more to RP than work and paying the bills.  I post when I can or feel its needed.  If that isn't good enough, I can leave.  ))</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Megatron mulled over his options carefully.  It was possible by sheer firepower he could overwhelm Rodimus Prime and end the confrontation quickly.  Yes, that sounded most logical.  The spark he was carrying would be safe tucked away in his many layers and parts.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"I am now on my way to your location," he radioed to Kup, lifting intot he air and transforming into his three part vehicle form and taking off.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sun, 9/14/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>

Finally though he turned away and examined the <BR>skyline, silent and brooding, wondering at the logic of serving with a <BR>team that served with Megatron.<BR>> <BR>> (TAG: Any)<BR>> <BR>> Preston<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
